content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 10 areas of personnel concentration, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisinformsGeneral Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The missile troops were affected by:

  • 2 UAV management points,
  • 1 Air Defense Defense Remedy,
  • 1 Station of Reb,
  • 1 enemy artillery.

As reportedArmyinform, The forces of defense per day repelled almost half a hundred attacks in six directions.

The forces of defensestoppedAttempting to penetrate the enemy sabotage and intelligence group in Sumy region in the area of the settlement of Stara Guta.
title: Aviation of Defense Forces caused 10 blows to the army of the Russian Federation
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. The missile troops were caught ...
author: Army Inform
